ModMetaData.name: Connected Bed
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new hospital bed with 4 cool features:
1. integrated nutrient paste dripper 2. automatic blood draining from prisoners 3. automatic blood transfusion for everyone 4. Optional connection to DBH for water and bladder needs
- fully mimics vanilla Hospital Bed - requires research of Hospital Beds and Nutrient Paste (both vanilla) - stuffable - costs 110 metallic + 6 components - requires construction skill 10 to build - consumes 25 power (VNPE external dripper needs 50) - runs less code than original VNPE dripper - safe to add/remove mid-game - configurable thresholds in mod's config
Sorry, no custom textures here (I've got trotter hands), just slightly greenish handles, like most VNPE things.
